00020 #include <vnl/vnl_matrix.h>
00021 
00022 //: Specializes vnl_matrix for integers, adding a vnl_matrix<double> ctor.
00023 class vnl_int_matrix : public vnl_matrix<int>
00024 {
00025   typedef vnl_matrix<int> Base;
00026  public:
00027 
00028   vnl_int_matrix() {}
00029   vnl_int_matrix(char const* filename);
00030   vnl_int_matrix(unsigned r, unsigned c): Base(r, c) {}
00031   vnl_int_matrix(unsigned r, unsigned c, int fillvalue): Base(r, c, fillvalue) {}
00032   vnl_int_matrix(const vnl_matrix<double>& d);
00033   vnl_int_matrix(const vnl_matrix<int>& d):Base(d) {}
00034   vnl_int_matrix& operator=(const vnl_matrix<int>& d) { Base::operator=(d); return *this; }
00035 };
00036 
00037 #endif // vnl_int_matrix_h_
